{"id":1048205070,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1694592851,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1048205070/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum String Length After Removing Substrings","memory":"6.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minLength(string s) {\n        size_t found = s.find(\"AB\");\n        if (found == std::string::npos)\n            found = s.find(\"CD\");\n        while (found != std::string::npos)\n        {\n            s.erase(found, 2);\n            found = s.find(\"AB\");\n            if (found == std::string::npos)\n                found = s.find(\"CD\");\n        }\n        return s.length();\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-string-length-after-removing-substrings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
